argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | irredn0.i | |- I = ( Irred ` R ) |
| 2 |  | irredneg.n | |- N = ( invg ` R ) |
| 3 |  | irrednegb.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_irredneg | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. I ) -> ( N ` X ) e. I ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_adantlr | |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. B ) /\ X e. I ) -> ( N ` X ) e. I ) |
| 6 |  | #P_ringgrp | |- ( R e. Ring -> R e. Grp ) |
| 7 | 3, 2 | #P_grpinvinv | |- ( ( R e. Grp /\ X e. B ) -> ( N ` ( N ` X ) ) = X ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. B ) -> ( N ` ( N ` X ) ) = X ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. B ) /\ ( N ` X ) e. I ) -> ( N ` ( N ` X ) ) = X ) |
| 10 | 1, 2 | #P_irredneg | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( N ` X ) e. I ) -> ( N ` ( N ` X ) ) e. I ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_adantlr | |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. B ) /\ ( N ` X ) e. I ) -> ( N ` ( N ` X ) ) e. I ) |
| 12 | 9, 11 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. B ) /\ ( N ` X ) e. I ) -> X e. I ) |
| 13 | 5, 12 | #P_impbida | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. B ) -> ( X e. I <-> ( N ` X ) e. I ) ) |
